description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-05-26 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Parks Canada Agency’s Highway Operations Unit has a requirement for the production, mixing and delivery of Winter Abrasives for Jasper National Park. The Winter Abrasives are to be supplied and crushed externally then delivered to Jasper Highways compound. These Winter Abrasives will be used as part of regular winter maintenance on Parks Canada roadways in Jasper National Park.
